thread.title: Arsenal tranfer news: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain eyed by Man City and Everton | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal tranfer news: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain eyed by Man City and Everton | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal tranfer news: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain eyed by Man City and Everton | Metro News
text:
Arsenal winger Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain a transfer target for Manchester City and Everton gossip Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 7:51 am Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain could be on his way out of Arsenal (Picture: Getty) 
Manchester City and Everton are reportedly interested in signing Arsenal winger Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain in the upcoming summer transfer window. Rumour Mill: our round-up of football gossip, rumours and speculation 
The England international has had something of a stop-start career at the Emirates Stadium, and has previously hinted himself that he could be tempted to try a new challenge. 
City boss Pep Guardiola is thought to be a long-time admirer of Oxlade-Chamberlain, who caught his eye when he came up against his Bayern Munich side in the Champions League in 2014. Oxlade-Chamberlain has been linked with Arsenal’s Premier League rivals (Picture: Getty) 
According to the Daily Mirror , City would be joined by Everton in pursuing the 23-year-old, with the Toffees supposedly set to give manager Ronald Koeman sufficient funds to strengthen his squad in the summer. 
Arsenal will no doubt want to avoid selling to a rival, but could struggle to keep the versatile midfielder as he’ll be in the final year of his contract next season.
